body:
Comment 1: 
Please check the output of your dmesg or syslog. You will find the oom killer killed off
this machine. You need at least 400mb of free ram per core to run the rotate tests
successfully.

You can safely ignore this error if this was the only failure you received.

I'm guessing you are building in a VM or on a host with no swap and or with overcommit
disabled.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
